Articles.Content:
Challenge:

You have to make it to the north or south pole, your choosing. You must only use a rover and as fast as you can. Also, no quicksaves. Modifications (editing files) to your kerbals for the engineering trait to repair wheels, or to do other things is allowed.

Rules:

  • Land-vehicle only, (you can add boosters, but that isn't very wise)
  • No quicksaving
  • No mods

Posting your attempts:

There isn't a prize for this challenge or anything. But it would be nice to see all of your attempts. When submitting attempts, please submit the mission time in the top left corner. Hope you have fun.
Welcome to the Forums! I don't mean to discourage you, but I would recommend reading the Challenge Submission Guidelines

I race HOC every polar expedition.

I bet him by 25 minutes in flight time. Faster by quite a bit more in reality.

Hope to do it again this year.

When i made my account guess what i did:P

Edited February 14, 2015 by Polar Explorer
